column4: Listen, i have 100GB of free unpartitioned space, now i need to instal xubuntu, how do i partition taht space?
does buntu make its own swap space?
so what should this ext3 mountpoint be
If you do not go back to the partitioning menu and assign a swap partition, the installation will continue without swap space.
the thing never asked me for swap space
well, i got 2 gb or ram here, will that be enough to run things without a SWAP?
chu. I think ubuntu adds swap by default in install
i doubt that if it actually told me i would be installling without aswap
OK I has never done that to me..
Be carefull read twice avtion once
I thought gparted was a gui
